April 14, 1956 D North Eastern Area (Championship Section)
Yorkshire Area (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest Yorkshire Area yorkshire-area-championship-section National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final)
Yorkshire
Championship
Orion [Bantock]
St. George's Hall, Bradford, West Yorkshire, England, UK 8 bands competed.
B&R qualified for the finals from 3rd place on the adjudicator's discretion (rule introduced 1956).
Dec. 7, 2011, 11:09 p.m. March 15, 2018, 5:06 p.m.
